com.craftar

Class CraftARItemFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.craftar.CraftARItemFactory

  • public class CraftARItemFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The CraftARItemFactory creates the items when a recognition request matched some image. This class will always return items of the class CraftARItem. If you want to create customized items (i.e, having extra fields), you must extend this class and call CraftARItemFactory.setFactory(YourClass yourFactory) to notify the SDK to use your Factory instead of the default one.
